module.name: colissimo_simplicite
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: Front page benetifs :An easy and quick installation that allows you to make all your national and international Colissimo withdrawal points available to your e-buyersEntering the tariff point withdrawal directly on Prestashop A customization of the front page point withdrawal in harmony with the design of your site Colissimo simplicité benefits : A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines (Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping and many others)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines (Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping and many others).
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿

module.name: realexpaymentshpp
module.description: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Realex Payment’s online payments solution helps over 13,000 businesses sell online and securely processes billions in transactions every year.
module.additional_description: Productivity : Improve your website securityOur seamless payment page allows your customers to easily make payments online.We ensure you offer the perfect combination of payment methods to your customers allowing you to maximise online sales for your business. We deliver a fully customisable payment experience that integrates with your brand and is supported by our powerful technology.Our commitment to innovation ensures you have access to the latest payment technologiesOur payment solution includes 30+ fraud checks & 3D secure authentication.

module.description_full: Adds a block with a table of your latest orders and a ranking of your products.

module.name: dashtrends

module.description_full: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: gridhtml
module.description: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: sekeywords
module.description: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface.

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer.To a private address: such as home, office or a family member.To one of our 1250 pick-up points: post offices or post points like supermarkets (Delhaize, Spar), bookshops (Press Shop, Relay), service stations (Total, Q8) and neighbourhood stores.To one of our 150 parcel lockers: ideally situated in high footfall locations, stations and shopping centres. Simplifying your logistics   With the Shipping Manager, your customers select their delivery method when they place their order online. You just need to take care of the practical aspects.Follow-up and preparation of your parcelsCreation of shipping and return labels, both domestic and internationalManagement of parcels shipmentsTracking  of your parcels  This add-on is available for free to all customers who have a signed parcels contract with bpost.
module.additional_description: Shipping Manager is an application that helps you manage your parcel shipments and create your shipping and return labels, both domestic and international. • Easy to integrate, plug and play. • Simple integration in your online shop: during the order process your customers will not even notice they have been transferred to Shipping Manager • Immediate access to the three bpost delivery methods: o Home delivery o Delivery to a pick-up point o Delivery to a parcel locker • Management of your parcel deliveries through the Administration module (label printing, parcel tracking, parcel preparation follow-up). • Thanks to its adaptive design, the graphical user interface automatically changes to suit the customer’s viewing device (smartphone, tablet, PC). • Configuration of prices based on delivery method, immediately visible in the online shop • Access to the most popular options for your shipments (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) • Printing directly from the backend of Prestashop • Track and trace your parcels online from the backend

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work: - Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: ewayrapid
module.description: Join thousands of merchants who choose eWAY as their preferred online payment provider. Create an eWAY account and get your online store transacting quickly with our FREE PrestaShop module today
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Join thousands of merchants who choose eWAY as their preferred online payment provider. Create an eWAY account and get your online store transacting quickly with our FREE PrestaShop module today.
module.additional_description: FAST settlement: Get paid to your nominated account in as little as 1 business day.EASY setup: Start transacting sooner with eWAY in just a few clicks.HELPFUL: Access 24/7 phone, email, and live chat support.HUMAN: Our local team of payment experts work around the clock.Advanced Fraud Prevention: Get real-time fraud monitoring on all your transactions.Detailed Reporting: Plan your next move with access to transaction reports in our MYeWAY Dashboard.Developer friendly: Our RapidAPI and Developer friendly tools let you fully customise the checkout experience to convert more sales.Reduce PCI Compliance: We help to secure your payments and reduce PCI compliance scope with our innovative payment technologies.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: With Klarna for Prestashop, you can let Klarna handle your whole checkout or you can make your existing checkout more poweful by offering the possibility to pay later and over time with invoice and pa
module.author: Prestaworks
module.description_full: With Klarna for Prestashop, you can let Klarna handle your whole checkout or you can make your existing checkout more poweful by offering the possibility to pay later and over time with invoice and part payment. Let customers pay after delivery with 100% payment guarantee.
module.additional_description: Easy to use​Easy to use - smoooth: It’s easy to get started with Klarna. Let Klarna handle the payments and minimize your administration.No risk, you will always get paidNo risk, you will always get paid: Klarna assumes both credit and fraud risk for merchants and consumers throughout the full customer journey.Less friction, more salesLess friction, more sales: Klarna maximizes conversion rates by letting consumers pay in a simple way when and how they prefer to. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchaseOptimized for all devices Since Klarna only asks for non sensitive information – Klarna’s payment methods will increase conversion. Without friction, mobiles can perform as well as desktops.Main features of Klarna​ Increase your conversion rate by letting consumers pay in a simple way when and how they prefer to. Risk free as they can pay for the goods after delivery.

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site. Amazon Pay can help you build, maintain loyal customers and as a result increase your sales.
module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage.
module.additional_description: ​Use this space to promote your seasonal offers or some important section of your shop!

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories.
module.additional_description: ​Makes it easier for your customer to navigate your shop and see available subcategories.

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store.In the header: either the "Call us" information or a "Contact us" link (redirecting to the contact page)In the footer: your shop's name, address and contact information
module.additional_description: Contact information is essential for a shop as it is part of what reassure the customers. Visitors will know they can join you through the medium of their choice, so do not hesitate to provide your contact details if you want your customers to reach you!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Adds a block that displays information about the customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block that displays information about the customer.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop. For instance, you can use this block of text to make a short presentation of your brand on your homepage.
module.additional_description: ​By providing information to your customers, this block of text can help you both in your content strategy and your search engine optimization.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Adds a form for newsletter subscription
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a form for newsletter subscription.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales by displaying new products, promotions or product selections directly on your homepage. Enhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion.
module.additional_description: Increase the visibility of chosen products or offersEnhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage with a professional look

module.name: ps_mainmenu
module.description: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website.

module.name: ps_sharebuttons
module.description: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page.

module.name: ps_socialfollow
module.description: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts.

module.name: welcome
module.description: Help the user to create his first product
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help the user to create his first product.

module.name: correos
module.description: Module to integrate Correos as transport provider and manage transport orders. Correos module allows integrated management for ecommerce shipments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Module to integrate Correos as transport provider and manage transport orders. Correos module allows integrated management for ecommerce shipments.
module.additional_description: Correos module for Prestashop allows the integrated management of transport orders easily using the following Correos services:Paq Premium and Paq Estandar in their modalities Home delivery, Post Office delivery, and CityPaq delivery for domestic shipments.Paq Internacional Prioritario and Paq Internacional Light, for international shipments. Correos is a global supplier of communication solutions, electronic and parcels. The company is also designated to provide the universal postal service in Spain, with efficiency, quality and sustainability. Correos has one of the largest transport networks with the latest technologies applied to the management of shipments. The company has a great portfolio of parcel services oriented to the market with fully flexibility. Correos solutions covers all the value chain.

module.name: contactform
module.description: Description for contact form module
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Description for contact form module

module.description: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: ps_checkpayment
module.description: This module allows you to accept payments by check
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to accept payments by check.

module.name: ps_currencyselector
module.description: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer.
module.additional_description: Facilitate cross-border sales by making it possible to choose the currency in which customers want to pay.

module.name: ps_customeraccountlinks
module.description: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account.

module.name: ps_facetedsearch
module.description: Displays a block allowing multiple filters
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block allowing multiple filters.

module.name: ps_languageselector
module.description: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content.

module.name: ps_searchbar
module.description: Adds a quick search field to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a quick search field to your website.

module.name: ps_shoppingcart
module.description: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content. It displays the number of products in the cart, with a summary, and acts as an entry point to the checkout.
module.additional_description: ​Remind your customer what they are about to purchase.

module.name: ps_wirepayment
module.description: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment. At the last step of the checkout, it will indicate to which account the payment should be transferred. This information will also be sent together with the confirmation email. The order will not be validated right away. You will have to change its status to "Payment received" when you actually received the payment.
module.additional_description: Adds an additional payment method to provide more flexibility to your customers.

module.name: ps_linklist
module.description: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section.
module.additional_description: ​Give more visibility to your pages, where you want and when you want.

module.name: ps_emailalerts
module.description: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications.
module.additional_description: Optimize your stock management and order processing by receiving alerts when:a new order is placed in your shopa product's stock is below a certain thresholda product's coverage is below a certain number of daysIncrease your sales by giving your customer the option to receive a notification when an out-of-stock product is available again

module.name: ps_advertising
module.description: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop. You can choose to advertize some specific section of your shop, some seasonal offers, or use this space for other advertising purposes.
module.additional_description: Your own advertising space with your own rules.

module.name: ps_bestsellers
module.description: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers.
module.additional_description: Showcase your top-selling products to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category.

module.name: ps_productinfo
module.description: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying a RSS feed.

module.name: ps_brandlist
module.description: Displays a block listing product brands
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block listing product brands.

module.description: Displays a block featuring your store's newest products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block featuring your store's newest products.

module.description: Displays your products that are currently on sale in a dedicated block
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: ps_supplierlist
module.description: Adds a block with a list of your product suppliers on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with a list of your product suppliers on your shop.

module.name: ps_viewedproduct
module.description: Adds a block displaying recently viewed products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying recently viewed products.

module.name: ps_crossselling
module.description: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance.
module.additional_description: Be transparent with your customers by telling them exactly what you do (and don't) with their private data.

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another. In case of a multistore installation, you can display the new products from one shop, right in the sidebar of another of your shop using its RSS Feed Block module. If you would rather not have your content be available to anyone online, disable this module.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales: with this module, loyal customers will be able to get regular updates about products added to your catalog, by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletterImprove your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new contentIncrease traffic: other websites will be able to display your new products on their page

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers. It gives you a way to automatically send discount vouchers to some of your customers.
module.additional_description: Recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled cartsIncrease customer loyalty by sending vouchers to a customer that reaches a given amount of ordersIncentivize re-purchase by sending vouchers to who customer who only ordered once and did not come back to your siteReward first-time customers by sending them a voucher after their first validated order

module.name: xsellco
module.description: xSellco is the leading e-commerce help desk, tailored specifically for online retailers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: xSellco is the leading e-commerce help desk, tailored specifically for online retailers. Centralize customer queries and order details from your Prestashop and other sales channels like Amazon, eBay and more in one simple dashboard.
module.additional_description: Save time and costs on customer supportSend fast, personal responsesExpand to new international markets with built-in auto-translateAnswer queries in real time with live chatUnlimited usersLive connections to 60+ e-commerce channelsCollaborative team dashboardNo overlapping query responsesMeasure team performance to ensure you meet your customers' expectationsTrack key metrics like response times and message volume for different query types so you can focus on areas that need improvement

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: trustedshopsintegration
module.description: Shop reviews, product reviews, trustmark, Google stars..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shop reviews, product reviews, trustmark, Google stars... The Trusted Shops module is the best solution if you want to offer your customers security, generate more traffic and boost the conversion rate of your PrestaShop.
module.additional_description: ConversionImprove security for your website visitors TrafficOptimise your visibility in search results Your benefits:·        The established market leader in trust solutions·        Collection of unlimited reviews at a fixed price·        Automated review collection·        Customisable layout·        The leading European trustmark·        Google partnership: star ratings, rich snippets, AdWords, Shopping·        Facebook app·        Mobile app to manage reviews·        Expert support team·        Authentic customer reviews The effects of customer reviews: ·        Up to 10% of review requests are converted into reviews·        The average shopping basket value increases by up to 5%·        Sales increase by up to 15% thanks to more customer trust Trusted Shops is the leading independent provider of trust solutions in e-commerce in Europe. More than 30,000 websites use Trusted Shops to turn customer trust into sales.Benefit now from the trust solution used by market leaders like Zalando, Thalia, Obi, Asos, Soletrader, Ugg and many more.

module.name: comnpay
module.description: Cash your credit card payments on your e-commerce site with the ComNpay payment module. Simple and secure solution. The Distance Selling contract included
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cash your credit card payments on your e-commerce site with the ComNpay payment module. Simple and secure solution. The Distance Selling contract included.
module.additional_description: Simplifying your online paymentsCashing of main means of paymentEffective anti-fraud devices

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: genei
module.description: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs. Try now, is free! We make more than 3000 ships per day!
module.additional_description: Merchants will save a lot of money using a online price-compare solution with many years of experience, and they can adjust price of products with more benefit margin.

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble.  At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data:  Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 165,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

module.name: upela
module.displayName: Upela - Parcel shipping at the best rate
module.description: Choose your carriers and the delivery mode for your shippings (dropoff, standard or express) and send all your orders directly from the Upela module
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Choose your carriers and the delivery mode for your shippings (dropoff, standard or express) and send all your orders directly from the Upela module. Without any monthly subscription, obtain fares up to -75% for your shippings!
module.additional_description: Upela is the best partner for shipments of e-sellers, small and medium companies. With its easy to use and all-in-one module, send all your orders directly from the module. Choose your carriers yourself and offer several delivery options to your customers: dropoff, standard or express. Get the best carriers offers with special discount up to -75% through our integrated solution which makes your shipment management flexible, easy and fast: improve your carrier service quality and your customers’ satisfaction.

module.name: easycreditratenkauf
module.description: ratenkauf by easyCredit is the easiest and fastest installment payment solution of Germany. Join today to get the simplest way of partial payment for your POS and E-Commerce
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: ratenkauf by easyCredit is the easiest and fastest installment payment solution of Germany. Join today to get the simplest way of partial payment for your POS and E-Commerce.
module.additional_description: Easy– effortless installation of the pluginFair – simple and transparent easyCredit-processesSpeed – instant feedback on credit enquiryHigh-selling – generate higher sales through a bigger cart valueAssured – credit risk secured by easyCredit (solvency risk)Secure – Maximum security for customer and payment dataProfitable – less order terminations due to no media disruption

module.author: PrestaShop

module.description: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS mo
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS module.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your client relations and increase your sales thanks to our handy and simple SMS sending solution. Inform your clients in real time of the progression of their purchaseRemind them of their current shopping basketCommunicate efficiently on all your events (sales, private sales, …)Segment and synchronize automatically your contacts on our platformBe informed by SMS about any new subscriptions, new orders and purchases or return demandsFollow and analyse the results of your campaignsManage your budget (no subscription, no hidden costs)After sale services and support based in FranceLowest price on  the market

module.name: hermesc
module.description: With the module Hermes Shipping Interface Connector you can create your shipping labels for Hermes directly from the backoffice of your Prestashop
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: With the module Hermes Shipping Interface Connector you can create your shipping labels for Hermes directly from the backoffice of your Prestashop. Select package size, generate label, print - finished.
module.additional_description: You can generate and print as many labels per order as you like, and even allow your customers to deliver their orders to package stores. The shipping process with Hermes can be done directly from the PrestaShop backofficeAdditional Hermes services can be selected within the backofficeThe Hermes mail prosecute can be accessed from the Prestashop backofficeThe package shop search and other services offer your customers a positive shopping experiencePickup orders are also set in the PrestaShop backoffice

module.name: snapcall
module.description: SnapCall is a digital button that will allow your customers to call you directly from your site
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SnapCall is a digital button that will allow your customers to call you directly from your site. The call will arrive on an application (smartphone / tablet) by displaying the name, the first name and the detail of the basket of the customer.
module.additional_description: - Simplify the customer relationship: by allowing customers, in one click and without changing media, to contact the competent person to provide information -> Increase of the loyalty rate- Demultiply your qualified contacts: focus on the strategic points of the purchase tunnel and prospects with high potential -> Lower acquisition costs- Convert your prospects into customers: by responding to the users just when they have themneed to conclude a transaction -> Transformation rate development

module.name: rovercash
module.description: RoverCash, the first NF525 compliant tactile cash register connected to PrestaShop. Sell your products in store with RoverCash and effortlessly manage your online sales
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: RoverCash, the first NF525 compliant tactile cash register connected to PrestaShop. Sell your products in store with RoverCash and effortlessly manage your online sales.
module.additional_description: Optimize your cross-channel sales management:Compliance with the Finance Law applicable on January 1, 2018 (NF525 cash register)Synchronize your catalog and stocks in real timeManage your physical store as an extension of your online storeGive your customers and salespeople all the flexibility of Click & CollectEnjoy a modern and intuitive cash register on Android tablet With RoverCash, simply manage your cross-channel business and equip yourself with a simple and efficient cash register that integrates the essential features for your store.

module.name: steavisgarantis
module.displayName: Guaranteed Reviews Company, shop and product ratings
module.description: Shop and/or product reviews, Google stars, Trusted certificate, automatic validation (option), review files importation… Improve efficiently your e-reputation by highlighting your customer revi
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shop and/or product reviews, Google stars, Trusted certificate, automatic validation (option), review files importation… Improve efficiently your e-reputation by highlighting your customer reviews.
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Sending review requests to your customers through our server ( high deliverability)Collecting and attesting your customers reviews (delivered on our Trusted certificate)Highlighting your customers reviews on your online shop (several customizable widgets available)  Impact on your sells:Increase your conversion rateGet more traffic on your rated product pages with Google Stars (applied automatically)Increase your average basket  Not yet convinced ?Monitor your e-reputation (possibility to moderate your reviews)Reassure your customers thanks to the transparency indexPersonalize your widgets and review request emailsSave time managing your reviews thanks to our intuitive and performant platformPhone and email supportLess than 10 minutes to install and set up the moduleNo obligation

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: coingate
module.displayName: Accept Bitcoin and 50+ Cryptocurrencies with CoinGate
module.description: Let your customers pay with Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum and other coins. Get Euro payouts to your bank, or keep Bitcoin
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Let your customers pay with Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum and other coins. Get Euro payouts to your bank, or keep Bitcoin. Start today!
module.additional_description: Accept Cryptocurrencies Hassle-Free With CoinGate, accepting cryptocurrencies is as easy as it gets. With a quick integration of our PrestaShop module, your customers can make payments on your online store with Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum and over 40 other cryptocurrencies. For a flat 1% processing fee (no setup costs or hidden fees), we will protect you from crypto price swings and chargebacks, handle all customer payments, and settle them directly to your bank account. Benefits for merchants Gain exposure and new customers. Accepting cryptocurrencies is a great way to promote your store and attract new paying customers.No chargebacks or fraud. You can always feel secure about your payments, because Bitcoin (and other cryptocurrency) transactions are irreversible.Save on payment costs. Credit card processing costs 3% or more, depending on industry. Our ONLY fee is 1% per transaction. Please note we cannot accept businesses registered in the United States for regulatory reasons.

module.name: sisucheckout
module.description: Increase your margins and your customer service. Offer your customers a fully digital customer journey by adding insurance service to the check out and increase customer satisfaction
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your margins and your customer service. Offer your customers a fully digital customer journey by adding insurance service to the check out and increase customer satisfaction. Happy customers will always come back!
module.additional_description: Sell individual product insurances at the digital point of saleBoost profitRaise your marginIncrease customer serviceStand out from competition using a unique service add-onInsurance is added via Plugin to checkoutConversion Rate optimization through tests and measuresHelps customers make a quicker purchase decision

module.name: labsmobile
module.description: Build loyalty with your customers and increase sales by sending SMS with LabsMobile. Set automatic SMS about status changes, alerts and notifications
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Build loyalty with your customers and increase sales by sending SMS with LabsMobile. Set automatic SMS about status changes, alerts and notifications. Send the best customized campaigns with all of the advanced SMS marketing features.
module.additional_description: With the LabsMobile SMS module, you will improve communication with your customers. SMS is a direct, international communication channel that has the best reading rates and a very low cost. This module makes many features available to you in order to: - Inform your customers of their order status at any moment.- Receive notifications and alerts about the main events of your e-commerce.- Increase sales by sending massive customized campaigns.- Increase the conversion rate of abandoned carts.- Inform about new products, discounts or clearances directly and instantly to thousands of customers.- Segment your client database to send messages or personalized offers.- Customize your messages with values in the text such as NAME, AMOUNT, ORDER NUMBER, etc.- Analyze the success of your campaigns and orders with statistics and reports.- Purchases integrated with the module in three simple clicks.- Support by our technicians who will solve any question or incident.- Sending emojis or any other symbol thanks to Unicode SMS messages.

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) comes into force on May 25, 2018
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) comes into force on May 25, 2018. Bring your store into compliance with the EU regulations!   Developed by the PrestaShop team with help from our GDPR experts, the Official GDPR Compliance module is the only one that offers you a complete solution adapted not only for your site that processes the personal data collected by the PrestaShop solution, but also the modules installed on your store.*   *More details in "Features" Note: This module is only compatible with PrestaShop 1.7, please click here to find the version for PrestaShop 1.5 & 1.6.
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.
